name: Abu Hanif Muhammad Syarubany
message: Taruna is a skillful person. He can do many things requiring technical skills, such as Data Analytics, Data Science, and Engineering principles. I was working with him in a competition and he could lead my team to win. I recommend him for employers who want to hire a skillful person.

name: M. Izzatul Fauzan Hasibuan
message: Taruna is an individual with excellent skills in teamwork, time management, and stress control. He can work well under pressure. Moreover, he is a quick learner, especially in matters related to technology.
